Accidental drowning and submersion(W65-W74)

column4: Exposure to electric current radiation and extreme ambient air temperature and pressure(W85-W99)

column3: X00-X09 연기, 불 및 불꽃에 노출
column4: Exposure to smoke fire and flames (X00-X09)

column4: Contact with heat and hot substances (X10-X19)

column4: Contact with venomous animals and plants (X20-X29)

column4: Accidental poisoning by and exposure to noxious substances (X40-X49)
Overexertion travel and privation (X50-X57)

column3: X58-X59 기타 및 상세불명의 요인에 불의의 노출

Assault (X85-Y09)
Event of undetermined intent (Y10-Y34)
Legal intervention and operations of war (Y35-Y36)

column4: Drugs medicaments and biological substances causing adverse effects in therapeutic use (Y40-Y59)

column3: Y60-Y69 외과적 및 내과적 치료중 환자의 재난
column4: Misadventures to patients during surgical and medical care (Y60-Y69)

column3: Y70-Y82 진단 및 치료에 사용되는 의료장치에 의한 유해효과
column4: Medical devices associated with adverse incidents in diagnostic and therapeutic use (Y70-Y82)

column3: Y83-Y84 처치 당시에는 재난의 언급이 없었으나 환자에게 이상반응이나 후에 합병증을 일으키게 한 외과적 및 기타 내과적 처치
column4: Surgical and other medical procedures as the cause of abnormal reaction of the patient or of later complication without mention of misadventure at the time of the precedure (Y83-Y84)
Sequelae of external causes of morbidity and mortality (Y85-Y89)

column3: Y90-Y98 달리 분류된 질병이환 및 사망원인과 관련된 보조요인
column4: Supplementary factors related to causes of morbidity and mortality classified elsewhere (Y90-Y98)

column3: Z00-Z13 검사 및 조사를 위해 보건서비스와 접하고 있는 사람
column4: Persons encountering health services for examination and investigation (Z00-Z13)

column3: Z20-Z29 전염성 질환과 관련되어 잠재적인 건강 위험이 있는 사람
column4: Persons with potential health hazards related to communicable diseases (Z20-Z29)

column3: Z30-Z39 생식과 관련된 상황에서 보건서비스와 접하고 있는 사람
column4: Persons encountering health services in circumstances related to reproduction (Z30-Z39)

column3: Z40-Z54 특수처치 및 건강보호를 위하여 보건서비스와 접하고 있는 사람
column4: Persons encountering health services for specific procedures and health care (Z40-Z54)

column3: Z55-Z65 사회경제적 및 정신사회적 상황에 관련된 잠재적 보건위험이 있는 사람
column4: Persons with potential health hazards related to socioeconomic and psychosocial circumstances (Z55-Z65)

column3: Z70-Z76 기타 상황에서 보건서비스와 접하고 있는 사람

column3: Z80-Z99 가족 및 개인 기왕력과 건강상태에 영향을 주는 특정 병태에 관련된 잠재적 건강위험을 가진 사람
column4: Persons with potential health hazards related to family and personal history and certain conditions influencing health status (Z80-Z99)
